abstract: When I was down in South Carolina at the end of the year, hanging out with conservative activists, there were already some rumblings about the plant closing in Gaffney and the attacks that might be coming on Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: When I was down in South Carolina at the end of the year, hanging out with conservative activists, there were already some rumblings about the plant closing in Gaffney and the attacks that might be coming on Mitt Romney. And here they are. Over on the Caucus, I just posted this column about why this line of attack might be more damaging to Romney than all the others. My magazine article about South Carolina and the meltdown inside the Tea Party movement will be online Thursday and in the magazine Sunday.

headline.main: Why This Attack Might Hurt Romney
